content:
Great to see what Dr. Nilay Pandey, Saurav Singh and Vivek Kumar have achieved at Agrix going back to the villages they came from and creating a profitable and fast scaling up model engaging directly with over 10,000 farmers and over 20000 acres in rural Bihar providing farm machines to the neglected rural farmer, inputs and supporting offtake .. no mean feat that many bigger funded start ups have not achieved to date..Keep it up!


Abhinav Grover Manish Johari Lead Angels Network

https://lnkd.in/gNmkASXe

Agrix expanding into new geographies, We are bringing our innovative, sustainable solutions to rural areas where they matter most. By empowering farmers with modern machine, quality inputs, and market access, we’re transforming agriculture and changing lives every day.
At Agrix, helping farmers grow isn’t just a mission—it’s our passion.

Our modern Digital Booking Point, makes it easier than ever for farmers to:
✅ Book machines for mechanized farming.
✅ Access premium-quality agri-inputs.
✅ Get soil testing and expert solutions for farming challenges.
✅ Connect to markets for better prices.
Farmers having one stop solutions under one roof (360 degree support).

Wheat : The Backbone of Bihar's Economy and Food Security!
Bihar produces a massive 5-6 million tons of wheat every year. Wheat is a major player in Bihar's economy, taking up ~28% of the state's farmland. This means wheat cultivation is vital for farmers' livelihoods and helps ensure food security for families across Bihar.

𝘙𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘮𝘣𝘦𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘰𝘴𝘦 𝘥𝘢𝘺𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘴𝘭𝘰𝘸, 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘶𝘢𝘭 𝘩𝘢𝘳𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨? 𝘕𝘰𝘵 𝘢𝘯𝘺𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦! 𝘈𝘨𝘳𝘪𝘹 𝘣𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨𝘴 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩-𝘵𝘦𝘤𝘩 𝘮𝘢𝘤𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴, 𝘮𝘢𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘩𝘢𝘳𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘳, 𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘪𝘦𝘳, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘦𝘧𝘧𝘪𝘤𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘵. 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘩𝘢𝘳𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘢𝘤𝘩𝘦𝘴 𝘶𝘴𝘶𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺 𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘪𝘯 𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘦𝘥 𝘭𝘢𝘣𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘦𝘹𝘱𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘦𝘴, 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘦 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘪𝘯 𝘸𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘨𝘦.

𝐀𝐠𝐫𝐢𝐱 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐚𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐚𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐁𝐢𝐡𝐚𝐫'𝐬 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐟𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬, 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐬 𝐢𝐧:

>𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞𝐝 𝐞𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲 𝐛𝐲 𝐮𝐩 𝐭𝐨 ~𝟑𝟎%
>𝐑𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐜𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐬 𝐛𝐲 𝐮𝐩 𝐭𝐨 ~𝟐𝟓%
>𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐬.

𝐖𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐝𝐨𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐀𝐠𝐫𝐢𝐱'𝐬 𝐦𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐭. 𝐅𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫'𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐭.


Explore more at: www.agrixagro.com

2024 𝘣𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘨𝘩𝘵 𝘶𝘴 𝘮𝘰𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘴𝘩𝘢𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘫𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘯𝘦𝘺 - 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘦𝘹𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 geographies 𝘵𝘰 𝘥𝘦𝘦𝘱𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘳𝘰𝘰𝘵𝘴. 𝘛𝘩𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘨𝘩 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘺 𝘤𝘩𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘦𝘯𝘨𝘦, 𝘸𝘦 𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘨𝘦𝘥 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘰𝘯𝘨𝘦𝘳, 𝘸𝘪𝘴𝘦𝘳, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘮𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘦𝘯𝘵. 𝘖𝘶𝘳 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴' 𝘥𝘦𝘥𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘪𝘯𝘷𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘴' 𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘴𝘵, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘴𝘶𝘱𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘴' 𝘧𝘢𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘶𝘴 𝘣𝘶𝘪𝘭𝘥 𝘢 𝘵𝘩𝘳𝘪𝘷𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘴𝘺𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘮 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘣𝘦𝘯𝘦𝘧𝘪𝘵𝘴 𝘢𝘭𝘭.
𝗔𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗽 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗼 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱, 𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲'𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗰𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗼𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿. 𝗠𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿 𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗯𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗷𝗼𝘆, 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗼 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲.

-𝐇𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐲 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐘𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐓𝐞𝐚𝐦 Agrix

Dr. Nilay Pandey Vivek Kumar Saurav Singh PRINCE PANDEY Sunidhi Kumari

As mango season arrives, it's crucial to protect your crops from pests and diseases. Sulphur spraying is a proven method to promote healthy flowering and fruiting.

Agrix is dedicated to providing farmers with innovative solutions, and sulphur spraying is a tried-and-true technique that supports healthy flowering and fruiting. The purpose of our tractor-mounted sprayers is to make spraying easy, efficient, and productive!
With our sprayers, you can:

- 𝗖𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗹𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀 𝗶𝗻 𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲
- 𝗥𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝗯𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗰𝗼𝘀𝘁𝘀
- 𝗔𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗲𝘃𝗲 𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺 𝘀𝗽𝗿𝗮𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗼𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗮𝗹 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝘀

Watch how our farmers in one of our cluster “Lakhisarai”  are leveraging our tractor  mounted sprayers to boost their mango production!

Now is the perfect time to spray your mango trees for optimal flowering and fruiting leading to higher yields and better quality mangoes!

Don't miss this critical window for spraying! Contact us to learn more about our tractor-mounted sprayers and take the first step towards a bumper mango harvest!

𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐦𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬!
𝘞𝘦 𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘦 𝘩𝘰𝘯𝘰𝘳𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘰 𝘩𝘰𝘴𝘵 𝘳𝘦𝘱𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘴 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘵𝘩𝘦 elea (𝘚𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘻𝘦𝘳𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘥) 𝘸𝘩𝘰 𝘫𝘰𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘥 𝘶𝘴 𝘰𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘨𝘳𝘰𝘶𝘯𝘥 𝘵𝘰 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘴 Agrix 𝘩𝘰𝘭𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘤 𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘢𝘤𝘩 𝘵𝘰 𝘦𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴.

From walking through freshly prepared fields to engaging in candid conversations with our farmer, the visit highlighted what drives us every day – creating a complete ecosystem that supports farmers at every step. Our team shared insights about how we're building a 360-degree support system, from land preparation to providing quality agricultural inputs to securing the best market prices for produce.

It was an inspiring day filled with meaningful interactions with farmers and our Implement Manager. We’re grateful for the opportunity to share our work and learn together. Here's to continuing our mission of closing the farming loop and creating lasting impact where it matters most - in our farmers' lives!

Dr. Nilay Pandey Vivek Kumar Saurav Singh PRINCE PANDEY Sunidhi Kumari Gerald Weigl Chloé Morenne
hashtags: #mechanisation Lead Angels Network Maple Capital Advisors Sushanto Mitra Prof Dhruv Nath Piyush Jain Mahesh Falod

content:
When we started with just 0.5 Cr in 2021, we weren't just looking at numbers— we were dreaming of the farmers whose lives we could touch. Today, standing at 𝟏𝟔.𝟐 𝐂𝐫 𝐢𝐧 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟓, we represent, family supported, farmer community strengthened, and field made more productive.

This 𝟯𝟮× 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘁𝗵 isn’t just a financial milestone. It represents the 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐰𝐞’𝐫𝐞 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐫𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧—one field, one farmer, one cluster at a time with vision of 100 clusters across the states.

We started in 2020 with a simple vision—mechanization through tractor interventions. But as we went deeper into the field, our understanding evolved. What began as a tractor-centric approach has now transformed into a full-fledged implement bank, equipped with a variety of machinery, aimed at both 𝐦𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐦𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 farmers’ fields.

In 2025, we are enabling 𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐚-𝐝𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐧 𝐟𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐠 by combining smart mechanization with cluster-level intelligence—helping farmers make informed decisions and boost productivity.

Agrix Pankaj Karna Maple Capital Advisors Prof Dhruv Nath Lead Invest Sushanto Mitra Piyush Jain Abhinav Grover Dr. Nilay Pandey Saurav Singh

𝘼𝙜𝙧𝙞𝙭 𝙞𝙢𝙥𝙡𝙚𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩 𝙖𝙧𝙚 𝙤𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙖𝙡 𝙖𝙩 𝙞𝙩𝙨 𝙘𝙡𝙪𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙧 𝙖𝙨 𝙬𝙝𝙚𝙖𝙩 𝙝𝙖𝙧𝙫𝙚𝙨𝙩𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙨𝙚𝙖𝙨𝙤𝙣 𝙝𝙖𝙨 𝙖𝙥𝙥𝙧𝙤𝙖𝙘𝙝𝙚𝙙, 𝙬𝙞𝙩𝙝 𝙤𝙪𝙧 𝙖𝙙𝙫𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙚𝙙 𝙩𝙧𝙖𝙘𝙠𝙚𝙧 𝙬𝙚 𝙖𝙧𝙚 𝙨𝙚𝙖𝙢𝙡𝙚𝙨𝙨𝙡𝙮 𝙣𝙖𝙫𝙞𝙜𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙚𝙫𝙚𝙣 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙢𝙤𝙨𝙩 𝙧𝙚𝙢𝙤𝙩𝙚 𝙖𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙨.

Here's a glimpse of our comprehensive Agri-tech solutions showing harvesting operation in Diara Region of Begusarai Bihar.

Our machine and its real-time tracking ensure efficient harvesting, even in the most remote areas. With digital land insights, we help farmers plan better and boost productivity. Additionally, our Implements Bank offers easy access to essential agricultural equipment & machinery bridging the gap in farm mechanization.

Together, we’re empowering Bihar’s farmers to grow more and grow better!

Agrix

Multiple screens displaying real-time farm mapping and tracking are in use. Mechanization is in full swing, enhancing efficiency and productivity.

The future of agriculture relies on mechanization and technology, and we are leading this transformation.

𝘈𝘴 𝘸𝘦 𝘦𝘹𝘱𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘤𝘩, 𝘸𝘦 𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘤𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘥𝘪𝘨𝘪𝘵𝘢𝘭𝘭𝘺 𝘮𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘴, 𝘦𝘯𝘴𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘺 𝘱𝘪𝘦𝘤𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘪𝘴 𝘶𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘵𝘰𝘰𝘥 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘰𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘦𝘥. 𝘚𝘰 𝘧𝘢𝘳, 𝘸𝘦 𝘩𝘢𝘷𝘦 𝘴𝘶𝘤𝘤𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘧𝘶𝘭𝘭𝘺 𝘮𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘦𝘥 𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘣𝘶𝘴𝘪𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘤𝘭𝘶𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘴, 𝘣𝘶𝘪𝘭𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢 𝘳𝘪𝘤𝘩 𝘥𝘢𝘵𝘢 𝘱𝘰𝘰𝘭 𝘵𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘦𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘴 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘤𝘳𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘤𝘢𝘭 𝘪𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘵𝘴 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘦𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘪𝘳 𝘥𝘦𝘤𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯-𝘮𝘢𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨—𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘶𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘰𝘪𝘭 𝘩𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘩 𝘵𝘰 𝘰𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘨𝘳𝘪-𝘪𝘯𝘱𝘶𝘵 𝘶𝘴𝘢𝘨𝘦 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢𝘥𝘰𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘣𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘤𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘱𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘱𝘳𝘢𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘤𝘦𝘴.

At Agrix, we channel data to optimize and regulate demand-based farm machinery, enhancing deployment efficiency. Additionally, we manage inventory according to farmers' needs, ensuring they have access to essential resources.

Our vision is to transform rural infrastructure with proper technology. Farming, a cornerstone of the Indian economy, still requires the technological support it deserves. It's time to change that.

Looking ahead, we see Agrix not just as an agriculture company but as a tech-driven organization shaping the future of farming through the Agrix Data Pool. Our mission is clear: 𝗙𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗹𝗱 𝗯𝗲 𝗮 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘀𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗼𝘂𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻. The future of agriculture lies in digital transformation for farmers. Agrix is here to lead the way.

𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐀𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧.

In Bihar, farmers usually follow two main cropping seasons: Rabi & Kharif. However, 𝘸𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘪𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘺 𝘤𝘰𝘶𝘭𝘥 𝘨𝘳𝘰𝘸 𝘢𝘯 𝘢𝘥𝘥𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘤𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘱𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘴𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘰𝘯?

Agrix is making this possible. We have introduced a new cropping season, especially for crops like moong. This allows farmers to take advantage of a third season called Zaid, which was not used much before. This leads to better efficiency and higher realization.

𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴 𝘤𝘢𝘯 𝘨𝘦𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘳𝘦𝘦 𝘧𝘶𝘭𝘭 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘥𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦 𝘴𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘰𝘯𝘴 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘈𝘨𝘳𝘪𝘹’𝘴 𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘦𝘭𝘺 𝘮𝘢𝘤𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘦 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘪𝘯𝘱𝘶𝘵 𝘢𝘷𝘢𝘪𝘭𝘢𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘺, 𝘮𝘢𝘹𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘰𝘵𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘢𝘭 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘨𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 , 30-40% 𝘣𝘦𝘵𝘵𝘦𝘳 𝘳𝘦𝘢𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯. Rural communities are now empowered with new opportunities for sustainable growth and long-term success.
Thank you, Prof Dhruv Nath, for graciously mentioning Agrix and our vision. We truly appreciate your support and recognition!

𝙈𝙖𝙞𝙯𝙚 𝙃𝙖𝙧𝙫𝙚𝙨𝙩 𝙎𝙚𝙖𝙨𝙤𝙣: 𝘼 𝙏𝙞𝙢𝙚 𝙤𝙛 𝙊𝙥𝙥𝙤𝙧𝙩𝙪𝙣𝙞𝙩𝙮 & 𝙀𝙛𝙛𝙞𝙘𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙘𝙮
As the golden fields across India prepare for harvest, Agrix is driving a quiet revolution — helping farmers transition from manual labor to mechanized efficiency.

Every season brings challenges:
Labor shortages
Rising input costs
Narrow harvest windows due to erratic weather

This is where Agrix steps in.
With our growing fleet of advanced maize harvesting machines, we are not just providing a service — we are redefining rural productivity and enabling data-backed, scalable farm operations.

Why it matters:
India is the world’s 6th largest producer of maize
Mechanization remains under 40% in maize harvesting
Post-harvest losses account for up to 10–15% of total yield
Every saved hour = increased profit for farmers

This season, we're expanding our operations with:
Field-ready equipment
Operator networks
Regional service centers
Support for real-time booking

Agrix creating change in rural areas.

At Agrix, we are bridging the gap between tradition and innovation.
Our team at Agrix is working across multiple locations, bringing modern  farm machinery to small and marginal farmers. Our tractors, harvesters, and other machines are in there full operation.
The machines are empowered by live tracking technology that enables real-time monitoring, optimized resource allocation, and data-driven decision making.
Our team works tirelessly, often in challenging conditions like 42°C heat, to ensure that every farmer has the machine and expertise they need to succeed.

Transforming Agriculture Through Farm Mechanization

We are excited to share our significant progress in agricultural mechanization! This year, we’ve achieved a remarkable 50-55% increase in farm mechanization and expanded our geographical reach by 40% compared to last year.

Our initiatives have not only broadened our impact across Bihar but have also strengthened our connection with marginal and small farmers.

Real change occurs when technology meets trust and innovation meets empathy. Together, we are paving the way for a more sustainable and inclusive agricultural future.

🚜✨ Happy to be part of a mission that aims to mechanize small and marginal farmers !

By empowering them with modern technology, we can enhance productivity, promote sustainability, and uplift communities.

Together, let’s transform agriculture and create a brighter future for all!
North India is facing climate change this year. As we move toward the Kharif season, especially for paddy cultivation, do you think the monsoon will support farmers this time?

𝐌𝐚𝐢𝐳𝐞 𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐟𝐮𝐥𝐥 𝐬𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐀𝐠𝐫𝐢𝐱 𝐢𝐬 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐭 𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐢𝐞𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐟𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐬!🌽

-> We're helping farmers 𝘀𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝘂𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝟲𝟬% 𝗼𝗻 𝗵𝗮𝗿𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗰𝗼𝘀𝘁𝘀– no more spending big on labour and logistics.

-> What used to take days 𝗻𝗼𝘄 𝗴𝗲𝘁𝘀 𝗱𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮 𝗳𝗲𝘄 𝗵𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀 – 𝟵𝟱% 𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 and more peace of mind, making farmers' operations more efficient.

-> 𝗡𝗼 𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗸, 𝗻𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗳𝘁, 𝗻𝗼 𝗵𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗹𝗲 – just smooth, safe, and fast harvesting.

-> Farmers no longer need to worry about buying a machine worth ₹40 lakh. 𝗪𝗲'𝗿𝗲 𝗷𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮 𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝘆, and harvesting an acre costs only ₹4,000.

->From sowing to harvesting – 𝘄𝗲 𝗯𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗲𝘁𝗲 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 to their fields.

We're not just offering machinery – 𝘄𝗲'𝗿𝗲 𝗴𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲𝗱𝗼𝗺 𝘁𝗼 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘄 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗿𝘆 , with the resources they need when needed.
Because 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗳𝗮𝗿𝗺𝗲𝗿 𝗱𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗯𝗲𝘀𝘁.



Shivraj Singh Chouhan Giriraj Singh BIADA Bihar Startup Bihar

🚜 Life as an Agritech Founder: Embracing Challenges and Opportunities

As an agritech founder, every day starts with calls from customers facing diverse challenges. Coordinating with our Cluster team, we work tirelessly to find solutions that make a difference.

Being at the helm means staying in the loop on everything—from technology utilization and machine availability to managing each farm digitally.

Over the past four years at Agrix, one key insight has emerged: the need for farm mechanization is immense. Yet, the market lacks organized players in this space. For small and marginal farmers, owning high-cost machinery is often not feasible.

We believe it’s time to bridge this gap and empower every farmer with the tools they need to thrive. 🌱

Let’s continue to innovate and support the backbone of our economy—our farmers!
We’re happy to welcome Anshika Verma as "𝘈𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘴𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘵 𝘛𝘳𝘢𝘪𝘯𝘦𝘦" to Agrix . Wishing her all the best for this new journey—looking forward to growing and achieving great things together! 🚀

🚜 Revolutionizing Agriculture with Advanced Mechanization🌾

We are excited to introduce the first tractor in the Agrix cluster, boasting over 65 HP and featuring a four-wheel drive, specifically designed to enhance agricultural mechanization for farmers in Bihar.

The performance of this machine is exceptional, offering unparalleled quality of service. It seamlessly supports various attachments, making it ideal for:

---> Cultivation
---> Ladger Levelling
---> Super Seeding
---> Straw Baling
- --> Straw Reaping
----> Harvesting Operations

This high-power tractor is a game-changer for Indian agriculture, allowing for perfect utilization of its capabilities.

Importantly, farmers can access this advanced machinery without the burden of high upfront costs, as it is available on a pay-per-use basis.

Together, we are paving the way for a more efficient and productive agricultural landscape. Let’s empower our farmers with the tools they need to thrive!

Field preparation is not just a routine task, but a crucial step in paddy cultivation. A well-prepared field, with properly levelled, de-weeded, and aerated soil, is the foundation for uniform seed germination and efficient water management, leading to higher crop yields. This is where Agrix's field preparation machines come into play.
Agrix recognizes the value of precision agriculture and the role that mechanization plays in improving productivity and sustainability. Our advanced field preparation machines are specifically engineered to address the unique requirements of paddy-growing regions:

Efficient Land Leveling – ensures even water distribution and reduces wastage
Reduced Labor Dependency – mechanized tillage minimizes human effort and speeds up the process
Enhanced Soil Health – improves soil structure and facilitates better root penetration
Faster Turnaround Time – saves time during critical pre-sowing periods

𝘉𝘺 𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘨𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘦𝘤𝘩𝘯𝘰𝘭𝘰𝘨𝘺 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘢𝘭 𝘢𝘨𝘳𝘪𝘤𝘶𝘭𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘢𝘭 𝘸𝘪𝘴𝘥𝘰𝘮, 𝘈𝘨𝘳𝘪𝘹 𝘯𝘰𝘵 𝘰𝘯𝘭𝘺 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘷𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘰𝘰𝘭𝘴 𝘣𝘶𝘵 𝘢𝘭𝘴𝘰 𝘦𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘸𝘦𝘳𝘴 𝘧𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘮𝘢𝘬𝘦 𝘪𝘯𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘥 𝘥𝘦𝘤𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴, 𝘰𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘤𝘦𝘴, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘦𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘧𝘪𝘵𝘢𝘣𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘵𝘺.

𝙍𝙚𝙞𝙢𝙖𝙜𝙞𝙣𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝘾𝙧𝙤𝙥𝙥𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙋𝙤𝙩𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙞𝙖𝙡 𝙞𝙣 𝘼𝙜𝙧𝙞𝙭 𝘾𝙡𝙪𝙨𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙨!
Traditionally, farmers in Bihar have relied on two main cropping seasons—Kharif and Rabi—often missing the Zaid season. This short-duration cropping window occurs between the Kharif and Rabi seasons and is ideal for crops like moong (green gram). As a result, a significant portion of the agricultural calendar has been underutilised until now.

Agrix is working to change this by providing timely access to mechanisation and quality inputs, enabling farmers to make the most of the Zaid season. This initiative is significantly boosting farmers' yields and promoting sustainable land use.

A key component of this transition is Agrix's harvesting machinery and comprehensive support system, which facilitates timely harvesting and access to quality agri-inputs. This not only reduces post-harvest losses but also enhances crop turnaround. Additionally, easy access to mechanisation improves operational efficiency while lowering labour burdens and costs.

The results are impressive—farmers are experiencing a 30–40% increase in annual yields. They also build greater resilience in their farming systems by improving crop diversity and soil health with nitrogen-fixing legumes like moong.

This achievement goes beyond just increasing yields; it represents a crucial step toward sustainable intensification, inclusive rural development, and long-term agricultural transformation—all made possible with the support of Agrix.

Agrix Expands Its Reach: New Cluster Launched in Sishma, Lakhisarai, Bihar 🌾

We are pleased to announce the successful inauguration of a new Agrix cluster in Village Sishma, District Lakhisarai, Bihar. This strategic expansion aims to strengthen agricultural infrastructure at the grassroots level, ensuring that farmers have timely access to advanced machinery, certified seeds, fertilizers, and soil testing services — all within their local ecosystem.
Agrix believes that sustainable agricultural development begins with empowerment at the village level. Through this cluster, we are fostering localized solutions, enhanced productivity, and rural self-reliance.
We are committed to transforming agriculture into a more technologically driven, efficient, and inclusive sector.
